structure.unit: A UNIFORM MILITARY AND OVERSEAS VOTERS ACT

law.catch_line: Use of federal write-in absentee ballot.
law.text: A covered voter may use a federal write-in absentee ballot to vote for all offices and ballot measures in an election described in KRS 117A.020.
law.history: Created 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 131, sec. 11, effective July 1, 2014.
